reviewText:
This video has some good tricks and ideas for improvised weapons, I've made and used each of them now and with very little practice I was able to wield each efficiently!
Jason's teaching style is relaxed and Informative and it's easy to follow along  with his example onscreen.
You don't need complex skills or a while workshop of tools either, with the bare minimum of supplies and a little time you'll have all of the projects made!
